t: Amazon.com: Novah® Professional Hair Clippers for Men, Professional Barber Clippers and Trimmer Set, Mens Cordless Hair Clipper for Barbers Haircut Kit Fade : Beauty & Personal Care
s: The traditional (if it can be called traditional) haircut in the Cavalry was the 'Horse Shoe'. Clippers were ran close to the skin at the highest point of the head, and then the high & tight was finished off that. But, I digress. I promptly went out and bought a name-brand corded set of clippers.
